loading:
The latest data is being loaded.
If this screen lasts for a long time, please visit our official server.
processing:
We are processing your request.
If this screen lasts for a long time, please visit our official server.

linkOpened.title: Check out your browser!
description: If your browser hasn't opened, click here or copy the link below.

input.tooltip: You can copy it by pressing Ctrl + C.
input.value: ERROR: This may be an invalid approach, or there may be no link to it.

linkNF.title: ERROR!
linkNF.description:
No input value provided!
This may be an invalid approach, or there may be no link to it.

cannotCancel.title: Warning
cannotCancel.description: You cannot exit the program in the current window.

noConnectionAlert.htmlTitle: Failed to connect to server. - Adobe Discord RPC
noConnectionAlert.Reason1:
Unable to access update server.
Please visit our official server.
noConnectionAlert.connectRetryTooltip: Try connecting to the server again.

UpdateAlert.htmlTitle: New updates are available! - Adobe Discord RPC
UpdateAlert.title: New updates are available!
UpdateAlert.description_top: You can update the programs below to the latest version.
list: Program Core
Program Monitor
Supporting Program List
Program Configurator
Program Controller
UpdateAlert.description_bottom: Do you want to proceed with the update?

cancel.title: Warning
cancel.description:
Problems with older versions are not supported.
Therefore, we are recommending an update.
Are you sure you want to continue?
cancel.official_discord: If You need, please visit our official server.
cancel.laterTooltip: We'll let you know next time.
cancel.skipTooltip: You will not be notified of this version again.
